com.write.Quill

Class UndoManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.write.Quill.UndoManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.write.Quill.BookModifiedListener, name.vbraun.view.write.GraphicsModifiedListener

    public class UndoManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements name.vbraun.view.write.GraphicsModifiedListener, com.write.Quill.BookModifiedListener
    The command manager. Every change to the notebook has to go through the command manager in the form of a Command class that knows how to undo/redo itself.
    Author:
    vbraun
